definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Availability of azolla-potassium for rice was studied with radioactive tracer.
sentences.chinese: 應用示蹤技術研究紅萍鉀對水稻的有效性。

sentences.english: Did Bihar really lie about this rice claim?
sentences.chinese: 比哈爾邦是否真的在水稻產量上造假了？

sentences.english: Inositol hexaphosphate was the main form of organic P in the organic manures and paddy soils.
sentences.chinese: 肌醇六磷酸磷對水稻的營養效果明顯優於無機磷。

sentences.english: The variable number of floral organs was observed in nsr spikelets.
sentences.chinese: 裸粒水稻小穗內的花器官數日也有較大的變異。

sentences.english: It will be an ideal rice transplanting machine at present.
sentences.chinese: 水稻鉢苗行栽機是目前較爲理想的一種水稻移栽機械。

sentences.english: It will be an ideal rice transplanting machine at present.
sentences.chinese: 水稻鉢苗行栽機是目前較爲理想的一種水稻移栽機械。

sentences.english: Study in Chemical Ecology of Tritrophic Interactions Among Rice, Nilaparvata Lugens and Anagrus Nilaparvatae;
sentences.chinese: 水稻，褐飛蝨，稻蝨纓小蜂的化學生態研究概述。

sentences.english: He added that rice and maize genomes that were decoded in the past were much smaller.
sentences.chinese: 他補充道，以往解碼的水稻與玉米基因組都要小的多。

sentences.english: All the new rice transplanters were quickly bought up the day they were offered for sale.
sentences.chinese: 所有的新型水稻插秧機在出售的當天就很快被買光了。

sentences.english: Using Improved serape-making method, the studies were made on the stomatal density of flag leaves of rice.
sentences.chinese: 用改良刮製法研究了水稻劍葉的氣孔密度。

sentences.english: Retrotransponson is one of the major parts of rice transposon.
sentences.chinese: 逆轉座子是水稻轉座因子的一個主要組成部分。

sentences.english: This Special English program was written by Marilyn Rice Christiano.
sentences.chinese: 這一個特殊英語課程的作者是瑪麗蓮水稻克里斯。

sentences.english: The bacteriophage technique was tested to enumerate the bacterial multiplication in leaf tissues of rice.
sentences.chinese: 應用噬菌體法估測了水稻葉片中白葉枯病的增殖。

sentences.english: And the soil loss of the grading terrace is more serious than the paddy field, with lower hypsography .
sentences.chinese: 地勢較高的緩坡梯田比地勢低的水稻田侵蝕嚴重。

sentences.english: Postharvest handling. One of the effort to increase rice yield is to reduce postharvest losses.
sentences.chinese: 增加水稻產量的另一措施是減少水稻收穫後的損失。

definition: long-grained rice (Indian rice, as opposed to round-grained rice)
early season rice/rice at transplanting or still unripe
